5% Albumin
Informed consent must be present on patient record

Blood Product Fact Sheet 5% Albumin
Recommended dose is 10 to 20 mL/kg (0.5 to 1 g/kg). Maximum dose 250 g (1000 mL)/infusion

25% Albumin
Informed consent must be present on patient record
Supplied in 50 mL and 100 mL bottles. 1 gram = 4 mL
Maximum infusion rate 1.5 mL/kg/h
Administration of 25% albumin in error, instead of 5% albumin, could result in circulatory overload
